movie.title: 127 Hours
movie.plot: The true story of mountain climber Aron Ralston's remarkable adventure to save himself after a fallen boulder crashes on his arm and traps him in an isolated canyon in Utah.
movie.awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 23 wins & 144 nominations.
